channel.title: AK Tanner!
channel.description:
[center] [size=15pt]AK: Tanner;[/size] by: Blumblebee and NCDS
Description: This is mine and Blumblebee's first script together though I would hope for it to be the first of many :) . He is a great guy and is getting [b]very[/b] good at what he does. This script is designed to tan cowhides into leather in Alkharid.
Feature's: - Excellent TPA walking - 100% Color - SMART - Antiban - AntiRandoms - Failsafes - Detailed ProgressReport - Multiplayer
Instructions: - Start char(s) in Alkharid bank. - Make sure Coins and Hides are visible on Bank screen. - Fill in DeclarePlayers; - Run it!
Currently no known bugs but please post if you find something or have any suggestions.
Enjoy Everyone :) [/center]

item.title: AK Tanner!
item.dc:creator: @payton payton
item.description:
@payton wrote:

i can’t get this to work…it takes forever to find the hides in my bank and then never makes it to the tanner.

Walking To Tanner

Searching for Ellis…
Didnt even get one Result
Didnt even get one Result
Didnt even get one Result
Didnt even get one Result
Didnt even get one Result
Didnt even get one Result
Failed To Find Ellis…

any suggestions?

I’m not new to this, I have been active on SRL forums for near 2 years now

Glad you like it though![/quote]
lol thats nice ive been script for some time tho and i can see that your a good scripter.

btw i havent tried this and i prbbly wont ever try it but im sure lots of other people will try this.

item.title: AK Tanner!
item.dc:creator: @NCDS NCDS
item.description:
@NCDS wrote:

[center]
[size=15pt]AK: Tanner;[/size]
by: Blumblebee and NCDS

Description:
This is mine and Blumblebee’s first script together though I would hope for it to be the first of many .
He is a great guy and is getting very good at what he does.
This script is designed to tan cowhides into leather in Alkharid.

Feature’s:

  • Excellent TPA walking
  • 100% Color
  • SMART
  • Antiban
  • AntiRandoms
  • Failsafes
  • Detailed ProgressReport
  • Multiplayer

Instructions:

  • Start char(s) in Alkharid bank.
  • Make sure Coins and Hides are visible on Bank screen.
  • Fill in DeclarePlayers;
  • Run it!

Currently no known bugs but please post if you find something or have any suggestions.

Enjoy Everyone
[/center]

Read full topic
